review: Fast delivery.  Products work well.  Very satisfied.

review: Some people just prefer having a remote that's not an app.

review: Having a Roku 3, I got this and the USB power cable for our bedroom set.  So far, so good.  Easy installation and once I signed in, all my Roku channels appeared.  I like the little USB power cable as it keeps us from having yet one more thing plugged into the wall.
author: Chris

review: Personally I would prefer one of the competitor's devices (Amazon / Google options).
author: Anony Mous

review: My boys like the streaming in their own words superb
author: Kindle Customer

review: Got everything quickly, on time, and for a refurbished item, it's working perfectly well! Love it.

review: Excellent movie about a genuine American hero at a time when we need hero's...!
